channel.title: Cloudflare R2 Incidents
channel.description: RSS feed of Cloudflare incidents related to R2

item.title: Elevated error rate on GETs for R2 in EEUR and WEUR
item.description: Customers with R2 buckets in EEUR and WEUR may experience an increase in error rates on GETs. While overall error rates in these regions remain low, some workloads may be affected disproportionately resulting in higher than expected error rates. We are aware of the issue and are actively investigating. Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.
